DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the muscle recruitment pattern and the effect of a 6 week shoulder exercise training program in healthy persons and subjects with shoulder impingement
DOC.brief_title: Shoulder Training: Muscle Recruitment Patterns and the Effect of an Exercise Program
DOC.criteria: current reported history of shoulder pain localised at the glenohumeral joint diagnosed as impingement two positive shoulder impingement tests pain reproduction during two of three additional categories of clinical tests the subject is able to perform painfree arm elevations with a resistance of 0.5 kg cervical and periscapular pain positive labral injury tests history of shoulder surgery
